TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: Thou knowest our frame, thou knowest our weakness, O Lover of mankind; we have sinned, but have not turned away from Thee, O God, nor have we stretched out our hands to a strange god. Spare us in Thy goodness, O Compassionate One.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: I will confess thee, O Lord
SEXTE.STICHOS: I will be glad and rejoice in Thee.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: the Lord is righteous and hath loved righteousness;
upon uprightness hath His countenance looked.
SEXTE.STICHOS: In the Lord have I hoped; how will ye say to my soul.
